original_text: They will lend money to you, but you will not lend money to them. They will become your leaders. You will have to follow behind them.
korean_text: 그는 네게 꾸어줄지라도 너는 그에게 꾸어주지 못하리니 그는 머리가 되고 너는 꼬리가 될 것이라

sentences.original_text: They will lend money to you
but you will not lend money to them
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그들에게 돈을 빌려주지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: You will have to follow behind them
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그들의 뒤를 따라야 할 것이다
